languages.text: "Чует мое сердце, не угодили мы вам... Да еще и эти сорвавшиеся с цепи уродцы! Весь праздник, все старания — кобыле под хвост!" {n}Последние слова угасают в неясном бормотании, пока дрожащая рука мужчины тянется к амасеку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Чует мое сердце, не угодили мы вам... Да еще и эти сорвавшиеся с цепи уродцы! Признаться, меня это так печалит! Весь праздник, все старания — кобыле под хвост!" {n}Последние слова угасают в неясном бормотании, пока дрожащая рука старика тянется к амасеку.{/n}

languages.text: "I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Чует мое сердце, не угодили мы вам... Да еще и эти сорвавшиеся с цепи уродцы! Весь праздник, все старания — кобыле под хвост!" {n}Последние слова угасают в неясном бормотании, пока дрожащая рука мужчины тянется к амасеку.{/n}

This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

"I feel in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course there were those freaks running wild! This entire feast, the all this endeavour, was a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the old man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

"I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

"I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

languages.text: “我发自内心地感觉到，我们没能让大人您感到开心。当然，这也得怪那群胡作非为的怪物！整场庆祝活动，付出的所有心血，最终全都白白浪费了！”{n}总督将颤抖的手伸向了艾玛赛克酒，最后几句话变成了断断续续的喃喃自语。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我发自内心地感觉到，我们没能让大人您感到开心。当然，这也得怪那群胡作非为的怪物！整场庆祝活动，付出的所有心血，最终全都白白浪费了！”{n}总督将颤抖的手伸向了艾玛赛克酒，最后几句话变成了断断续续的喃喃自语。{/n}

languages.text: «En el fondo de mi corazón siento que no he logrado complacerle. ¡Por no mencionar esas alimañas desbocadas! ¡Tanta organización, tanto esfuerzo, todo ha sido un desperdicio tremendo!». {n}El hombre farfulla las últimas palabras mientras extiende una mano temblorosa hacia el amasec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En el fondo de mi corazón siento que no he logrado complacerle. ¡Por no mencionar esas alimañas desbocadas! ¡Tanta organización, tanto esfuerzo, todo ha sido un desperdicio tremendo!». {n}El hombre farfulla las últimas palabras mientras extiende una mano temblorosa hacia el amasec.{/n}

languages.text: "Kalbimde sizi memnun edemediğimizi hissediyorum. Tabii ki sağda solda koşuşturan o ucubeler yüzünden! Bütün bu kutlama, tüm bu çaba, muazzam bir israftı!" {n}Adamın titreyen eliyle amaseke uzanırkenki son kelimeleri, anlaşılmaz bir mırıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kalbimde sizi memnun edemediğimizi hissediyorum. Tabii ki sağda solda koşuşturan o ucubeler yüzünden! Bütün bu kutlama, tüm bu çaba, muazzam bir israftı!" {n}Adamın titreyen eliyle amaseke uzanırkenki son kelimeleri, anlaşılmaz bir mırıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたを満足させることに失敗したと感じています。もちろん、走り回っているものもいました！この祝典、この試みはすべて、とんでもない無駄でした！」{n}最後の言葉は、まとまりのないつぶやきとなり、彼の震える手がアマセックに伸びる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたを満足させることに失敗したと感じています。もちろん、走り回っているものもいました！この祝典、この試みはすべて、とんでもない無駄でした！」{n}最後の言葉は、まとまりのないつぶやきとなり、老人の震える手がアマセックに伸びる。{/n}

languages.text: « Je sens que nous ne sommes pas parvenus à vous satisfaire. Sans parler de ces créatures déchaînées ! Toutes ces réjouissances, tous ces efforts, et pour quoi ? Ça n'aura été qu'un immense gâchis ! » {n}Ses derniers mots se noient dans un murmure incohérent tandis qu'il tend une main tremblante vers l'amasec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je sens que nous ne sommes pas parvenus à vous satisfaire. Sans parler de ces créatures déchaînées ! Toutes ces réjouissances, tous ces efforts, et pour quoi ? Ça n'aura été qu'un immense gâchis ! » {n}Ses derniers mots se noient dans un murmure incohérent tandis qu'il tend une main tremblante vers l'amasec.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich spüre in meinem Herzen, dass wir Euch enttäuscht haben. Und natürlich sind diese Wahnsinnigen frei herumgelaufen! Diese gesamte Feier, diese gesamte Unternehmung war nichts als eine gewaltige Verschwendung!" {n}Die letzten Worte verblassen zu einem unverständlichen Gemurmel. Mit zitternder Hand greift der Mann nach dem Amasec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I feel it in my heart that we have failed to please you. And of course, there were those freaks running wild! This entire celebration, this whole endeavour, has been a tremendous waste!" {n}The last words fade into an incoherent mutter as the man's trembling hand reaches for the amasec.{/n}
